nl.esciencecenter.octopus.engine

Class OctopusEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.octopus.engine.OctopusEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Octopus

    public class OctopusEngine
extends Object
implements Octopus
    Implementation of Octopus Interface class. Redirects calls to adaptors, and the FilesEngine
    Author:
    Niels Drost
